897880.name: The Occluder
897880.description:
The Occluder is an investigation game filled with suspense! With various gameplay difficulties, you can adapt to your style and face each challenge. The game also features online interactions, including a chat function to communicate with other players.

Story

Bruce is an investigator hired by Maria to find her husband, Alex, a journalist who disappeared while documenting strange creatures in a hazardous area. This zone was affected by a nuclear disaster in Russia, altering the residents. After a failed government mission to contain the situation, your task is to film the area and escape.

Armed only with your camera and flashlight, explore the environment, capture footage, and try to survive this terrifying place.
